title: Katie Price wants a baby within a year after reunited with toyboy Kris Boyson
text:

Katie Price reckons she might walk down the aisle and have a baby next year.

The former glamour model, 41, recently got back together with ex Kris Boyson and moved him back in with her.

Chatting with Flex FM , Katie laughed: "Next year maybe a baby and a wedding."

She's already got five kids - Harvey , 17, with Dwight Yorke, Junior, 14 and Princess, 12, with ex-husband Peter Andre , and Jett, six and Bunny, five, with another ex-hubby, Kieran Hayler .

Now she's back on with Kris, a source told The Sun Online .

The source said: "He's taken her back and they're already moving some of his things back into the house.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: SplashNews.com)

"They're officially back on - everyone's shocked that he didn't make it harder for her, but they're back to being loved-up again like they never split up."

Katie and Kris previously threw in the towel on their relationship and engagement after she dumped him by text for a fling with new toyboy, Charles Drury .

She was snapped on a night out in Turkey looking a bit worse for wear during her whirlwind romance with 22 year-old Charles.

On social media, she's cut off Charles after he refused not to sign a document stopping him from blabbing about her.

(Image: charlesdrury1/Instagram)

Last week, Katie was seen leaving Kris' Kent home with youngest two Jett and Bunny in tow.

After their breakup, a heartbroken Charles took to his Instagram story, writing: "You never really forget the ones who touched your heart; regardless whether its the ones who broke it or healed it."

He seems hopeful for the future though, later posting: "Good things come to those who wait. But better things come to those who work for it."

(Image: charlesdrury1/Instagram)

The young hunk also hit out at rumours that he was set to appear in the upcoming winter edition of Love Island, calling the whispers "more fake news."

Katie meanwhile has also dropped several claims about her marriage to Peter Andre, which ended a decade ago.

After they split, Katie claims, Peter got cosy with Sugababe Keisha Buchanan.

In the same interview with Flex FM, she claimed: "I remember the black girl, what was her name? She got friendly with Pete after we split."

Host Rick Live quickly moved on the conversation.
description: After Katie reunited with toyboy Kris and moved him back into her mucky mansion, she claims next year could see her walking down the aisle and having another child
